Class MessageService

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.service.business.MessageService

  • public class MessageService
extends Object
    Business Service class in charge of operations concerning the Message entities.

      • getInitialMessageOfConversation

        public Message getInitialMessageOfConversation(String conversationId)
        Gets the first outgoing message of a conversation based on a conversation ID.
        Parameters:
        conversationId - String Conversation ID
        Returns:
        a Message or null if not present in the database.

      • isMessageIdAlreadyUsed

        public boolean isMessageIdAlreadyUsed(String messageId)
        Finds a Message based on its Message.getMessageId() value.
        Parameters:
        messageId - - String UUID of the message
        Returns:
        a Message or null if no message with the messageId is in the database.

      • hasEveryCommonReferenceQuerySentAResponseReceived

        public boolean hasEveryCommonReferenceQuerySentAResponseReceived(org.joda.time.LocalDateTime creationTime)
        Checks whether each outbound CommonReferenceQuery message has a related inbound CommonReferenceQueryResponse for the given creation time.
        Parameters:
        creationTime - LocalDateTime creation time of the common reference query.
        Returns:
        true if every query has a response.
